<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>cmn_location_type</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete location type</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
// Add your code here var gr = new GlideRecord('cmn_location'); gr.addQuery('type',current.sys_id); gr.query(); while(gr.next()){ var arr = gr.getValue('type').split(','); var index = arr.indexOf(current.getValue('sys_id')); arr.splice(index,1); gr.setValue('type',arr.toString()); gr.update(); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-10 18:45:36</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2e8aa227c311320071d07bfaa2d3ae0e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete location type</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2e8aa227c311320071d07bfaa2d3ae0e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-10-27 20:16:33</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2e8aa227c311320071d07bfaa2d3ae0e"/> </record_update>
